XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local/navnotice plugin

TABLE.NAME: local_navnotice_items
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores navbar items and notifications configurations for different user types

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of the item: navitem or notification

FIELD.NAME: usertype
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of user the item is visible to

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: URL for navbar items, if applicable

FIELD.NAME: icon
FIELD.COMMENT: Icon for navbar items, if applicable

FIELD.NAME: content
FIELD.COMMENT: Content of the notification, if applicable

FIELD.NAME: alerttype
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of alert for notifications, if applicable
